ALL NEW BEST VALUE DEAL : Double Sized SSD Disk Space and Un-Metered GigE Bandwidth Packages​


TurnKey Internet, Inc provides dedicated servers, colocation, web hosting, cloud, and virtual servers from it's company-owned and operated green datacenter. Since 1999, TurnKey Internet, Inc. has built a reputation of outstanding personalized service, reliability, and value. Owning our own datacenter lets our on-site 5-star rated staff answer your questions quickly and provide complete solutions direct from our expert team located right in the same building as your servers. We are experts in the Cloud Hosting and Datacenter space with a true dedication to your online success every step of the way.

View all cPanel Linux Web Hosting Packages | View all Microsoft Windows web hosting Packages

View all Virtual & Cloud Server packages | View all Fully Managed Virtual & Cloud Server packages

Our company-owned enterprise grade web hosting servers exclusively use SSD disk systems in high performance and redundant RAID-10 configuration - each web hosting server has at least 24+ CPU cores and 32 GB of ram, and dedicated Gigabit network speeds - for blazing fast performance to host your web sites and applications such as Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal, and much more!


Turnkey Best Value Deal Plesk Microsoft Windows Web Hosting Plans include these advanced features:

  • Windows Server 2012 with IIS 8
  • Parallels Plesk 12 for Windows Server Control Panel
  • GREEN hosting - solar powered datacenter, host responsibly!
  • Secure Enterprise Grade Dell Poweredge Servers - 24+ CPU Cores, 32GB + Ram, SSD Raid 10 Disk Systems
  • dual HexaCore CPU's with HyperThreading = 24+ CPU Cores!
  • 32+ GB DDR3 Ram (FAST!) - some servers with 64GB+ or 128GB+!
  • Double Sized SSD Disk Space & Unlimited GigE Gigabit Bandwidth Included!
  • RAID 10 Data Protection with ultra fast 6 GB/s SSD Disks
  • IPv6 Address Included for EVERY web site at no cost
  • MSSQL 2014 (Microsoft SQL Server 2014) Database Server
  • MySQL 5.x Database Server
  • Classic ASP Support, .NET 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5
  • Dedicated Resource Pool
  • PHP 5.4 & 5.5
  • Perl, CGI, Server Side Includes, Python
  • Online Webmail (Horde & MailEnable Webmail )
  • Unlimited Email Accounts : POP, IMAP, SSL-POP, SSL-IMAP
  • Unlimited Email Aliases, POP and IMAP
  • FTP Publishing, Web Publishing - and more!
  • Web SiteBuilder and Website Building Tools
  • CloudFlare CDN - Optimized Hosting, Delivery and Security
  • R1Soft Continuous Data Protection Server Wide (Remote Backups and Off Site Backups)
  • 100% Network uptime guarantee
  • 30 day money back guarantee
  • 24 x 7 Support via phone, email, help desk and our live help chat
  • Free data migration from your old host to our servers
  • Massive Web Supported Application Catalog for Auto Installation : including
    • WordPress
    • Joomla
    • Drupal
    • Magento
    • Zen Cart
    • Much more++!

FREE IPv6 Addresses : All web hosting plans provide native IPv6 addressing, along with the more popular IPv4 Address(es) are already included on your account. This means your applications and web sites will be ultra fast and directly reachable to anyone on the Internet using both the traditional IPv4 addresses as well as the new expansion into the IPv6 Addressed Internet. You don't need to do anything different, we simply make your web hosting future proof here at TurnKey - and you are IPv6 enabled when you host with us!
